transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: ha ji
Executive: Very good morning.
Customer: Mobile loot only.
Executive: Abhimanyu Singh baat kar raha hun sir senior manager India mart se.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Ji sir aapka ek concern aaya hua hai India mart mein right bataenge sir kya issue aa raha hai aapko sir.
Customer: Maine ek naya employee hire chahiye to usko ek technical knowledge deni hai India mart ki thodi.
Executive: hmm.
Customer: Aur unka ek number add karna tha PNC pe.
Executive: hmm.
Customer: PNC pe number add karna hai unka.
Executive: PNS pe.
Customer: ha PNS pe right aur aapke jo new assistant hai jo India mart use karenge unko proper guidance deni hai right.
Customer: ha.
Executive: To abhi wo available hai sir.
Customer: Abhi to wo nikal chuke hain kyuki late ho gaya tha.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: To kab tak available ho payenge ye.
Customer: Abhi main ek baar connect karke dekhta hun kya scene hai.
Executive: Ek baar sir connect karke sir update kijiye right main aapko 10 minute baad connect kar leta hun to hamari team properly.
Customer: Number note kar lijiye unka.
Executive: Ek minute.
Executive: Ji number bataiye.
Customer: 7417
Executive: 7417
Customer: 706347
Executive: 7063 47 47
Executive: Ye aapke employee ka number hai right.
Customer: ha ji.
Customer: matlab kya hai relative hi hai matlab main aap ye bol sakte ho.
Executive: Sorry.
Customer: relative hi hai matlab main aap ye bol sakte ho.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha.
Executive: Okay sure main na unhe kar leta hun.
Executive: Connect karke ek baar go through kar leta hun kab available hai to uske according meeting team se main arrange kara deta hun okay.
Customer: theek hai.
Executive: Okay thank you.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Need to provide technical knowledge of IndiaMART.

- Wants to add employee number to PNS.



Resolution:

- Executive noted the employee's number.

- Will connect and arrange a meeting with the team.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- pns, employee, guidance, technical knowledge
